column3: Roll a row die. Set all dice in that row back to seed state. Clear all traps and poison tokens in that row.
Roll a column die. Set all dice in that column back to seed state. Clear all traps and poison tokens in that column.
Roll a column and row dies. Put a trap token there or to the closest harvest.
Roll a column and row dies. Put a poison token there or to the closest harvest.
Roll a column and row dies. Active player puts a fence, choosing the direction of the fence.
Roll a row die. Put a hunter there
Roll a column die. Put a hunter there
